companies.name: HubSpot
companies.description: Inbound marketing, sales, and service software that helps companies attract visitors, convert leads, and close customers.

recentNews.title: HubSpot Reports Q2 2023 Results
recentNews.summary: Total revenue increased 25% year over year to $529.1M.

recentNews.title: HubSpot Unveils New AI Features
recentNews.summary: Announced ChatSpot.ai - generative AI tools for marketing and sales teams.

companies.name: Shopify
companies.description: E-commerce platform that allows businesses to create and run their online stores with tools for inventory, payments, and shipping.

recentNews.title: Shopify Announces Q3 2023 Results
recentNews.summary: Revenue growth of 22% year over year to $1.7B.

recentNews.title: Shopify Launches Commerce Components
recentNews.summary: New enterprise offering lets large retailers access Shopify's components individually.

companies.name: Stripe
companies.description: Online payment processing for internet businesses, handling billions of dollars of transactions for businesses of all sizes.

recentNews.title: Stripe Raises $6.5B at $50B Valuation
recentNews.summary: Reduced from previous $95B valuation in 2021, reflecting broader market shift.

recentNews.title: Stripe Launches Financial Connections
recentNews.summary: New product to simplify connecting financial account data for businesses.

companies.name: Epic Systems
companies.description: Healthcare software company that develops electronic health record systems used by healthcare organizations.

recentNews.title: Epic Announces New AI Assistant
recentNews.summary: Launched Cheers, an ambient documentation AI assistant for clinicians.

recentNews.title: Epic Partners with Microsoft on Cloud Solutions
recentNews.summary: Collaboration to bring Epic's EHR solutions to Microsoft's Azure cloud platform.

companies.name: Tesla
companies.description: Electric vehicle and clean energy company producing electric cars, battery storage, and solar products.

recentNews.title: Tesla Announces Q3 2023 Production and Delivery Numbers
recentNews.summary: Produced over 430,000 vehicles and delivered over 435,000 vehicles.

recentNews.title: Tesla Unveils Cybertruck
recentNews.summary: Finally began deliveries of the long-awaited Cybertruck at a special event.
